entry.title: üéâ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a ‚≠êÔ∏è

entry.title: Wafari - Watch Browser
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫19,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫4,99 [‚Ç∫4,99 ~ ‚Ç∫29,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫4,99

Application Description

Wafari Watch Browser, allowing you to effortlessly browse the web on your Apple Watch. Supports multiple search engines with customizable search options. Quick bookmark creation and synchronization. Browsing history. iCloud data synchronization. Welcome to use!

entry.title: Super Mega Lucky Box
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫129,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫39,99 [‚Ç∫39,99 ~ ‚Ç∫129,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫39,99

Application Description

In this spectacular game of colossal fun, reveal numbers one-by-one and close a corresponding square on one of your cards. Your goal is to score as many points as possible, and you'll do that mostly by crossing off the nine numbers printed in a 3x3 grid. Get three-in-a-row to unlock bonuses, which can help you close more squares and trigger even more bonuses. Use Lightning tokens to nudge numbers to your liking, but don‚Äôt forget about Moon tokens to avoid an end-game penalty. At the end of a round, you score points for each card that you've completely marked off, with the points diminishing each round from 15 in round one to 8 in round four. After four rounds, you score 1 point for each two spaces Xed on unfinished cards. Together with your points from completed cards, stars and moons, this determines your total score. The App offers you weekly single-user challenges in 3 game modes with varying degrees of randomness, so you can compete with players from all over the world in the highscore lists. But of course you also can just play for yourself and collec tg various achievements. Awards 2022 Tric Trac Nominee 2022 Mensa Recommended 2021 Cardboard Republic Socializer Laurel Nominee

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Driving Zone: Germany Pro
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • 550,000 coinsÔºö‚Ç∫449,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫349,99 [‚Ç∫349,99 ~ ‚Ç∫449,99]
  • 1,300,000 coinsÔºö‚Ç∫999,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫599,99 [‚Ç∫599,99 ~ ‚Ç∫999,99]
  • 2,000,000 coinsÔºö‚Ç∫1.299,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫799,99 [‚Ç∫799,99 ~ ‚Ç∫1.299,99]
  • 3,000,000 coinsÔºö‚Ç∫1.999,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫999,99 [‚Ç∫999,99 ~ ‚Ç∫1.999,99]

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫19,99

In-App Purchases

  • 20,000 coinsÔºö‚Ç∫19,99
  • 220,000 coinsÔºö‚Ç∫179,99
  • 90,000 coinsÔºö‚Ç∫99,99
  • 550,000 coinsÔºö‚Ç∫349,99
  • 1,300,000 coinsÔºö‚Ç∫599,99
  • 2,000,000 coinsÔºö‚Ç∫799,99
  • 3,000,000 coinsÔºö‚Ç∫999,99

Application Description

Driving Zone: Germany Pro - car game and street racing simulator without ads and limits. Drive with realistic physics and legendary german cars. In this game are presented cars prototypes of the German manufacturers: from classic city cars to powerful modern sports cars and luxury cars. Each car in the game has it's own technical specifications and engine sounds. Well detailed body and dashboard create the effect of full presence and realism. The game offers four unique tracks with different weather conditions. You can drive on high-speed highway, or go for a ride in the German town, which is particularly beautiful at night. If you are a real extreme racer, you should drive on winter track with dangerous icy road. You can choose the starting time of the day, that will change dynamically. You can also try driving on special race or drift track. Start the engine, press down on the gas and chase as quickly as possible. Earn points by overtaking traffic cars. Or go to the race track and try to pass it by shortest time for take maximum reward. Another mode is drift, where you can test your skills of drifting and earn points by fast and sharp skid angles. You will need points to open the new vehicles, modes and other features of the game. This racing simulator gives you the ability to choose the style of driving that can be quiet and safe or extremely dangerous racing. The abundance of settings allows you to customize a level of car physics realism, from arcade and simulation levels to the most realistic, as in the difficult racing simulator in which you will need to show your driving skills. Features: - No ads. - Modern beautiful graphics; - Car tuning and customization feature; - Realistic car physics; - Change the time of day in real-time; - 4 levels for street racing, many configurations of racetracks and drift tracks with different weather conditions; - First person view / Interior view / Cinematic camera; - Automatic cloud synchronization of your game progress. Warning! This game is quite realistic, but it is not designed to teach you how to street racing. Be careful and responsible when you're driving real car. Enjoy virtual driving in heavy car traffic, but please observe the traffic rules and be careful on real roads.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: DEATH STRANDING DIRECTOR'S CUT
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫899,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫399,99 [‚Ç∫399,99 ~ ‚Ç∫899,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫399,99

Application Description

From legendary game creator Hideo Kojima comes a genre-defying experience, now expanded in this definitive DIRECTOR‚ÄôS CUT. In the future, a mysterious event known as the Death Stranding has opened a doorway between the living and the dead, leading to grotesque creatures from the afterlife roaming the fallen world marred by a desolate society. As Sam Bridges, your mission is to deliver hope to humanity by connecting the last survivors of a decimated America. Can you reunite the shattered world, one step at a time? DEATH STRANDING DIRECTOR'S CUT on iOS includes a HIGH FRAME RATE, PHOTO MODE, and cross-over content from Valve Corporation's HALF-LIFE series and CD Projekt Red's Cyberpunk 2077. Stay connected with players around the globe with the Social Strand System‚Ñ¢. Mac and iOS ‚Ä¢ Sign-in to iCloud and activation of iCloudDrive are required to play this product. ‚Ä¢ This product can be played offline, but a network connection is required to fully experience the Social Strand System‚Ñ¢. Communication fees will be incurred during online play. Only for iOS version ‚Ä¢ When playing this product for the first time, you will be required to download additional data. You can start the game once you have downloaded approximately 13 GB, but additional downloads will occur as the game progresses, requiring a total of approximately 50 GB of downloads. Additional downloads will occur when additional language voice data is used. FAQs https://505.games/DSDCAppStoreFAQ

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Lumy
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫299,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫24,99 [‚Ç∫24,99 ~ ‚Ç∫299,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫24,99

In-App Purchases

  • All the Light (Huge Tip)Ôºö‚Ç∫449,99
  • More Light (Medium Tip)Ôºö‚Ç∫179,99
  • A Little Light (Small Tip)Ôºö‚Ç∫39,99

Application Description

Lumy is a beautiful sun tracker + outdoor activities planner. - Need perfect lighting for stunning photos or videos? Done. - Planning a sunrise walk or sunset hike? Easy. - Outdoor yoga or a sunshine break? Covered. Whether you‚Äôre chasing golden hour, planning your daily dose of vitamin D, or keeping track of moon phases for stargazing, Lumy helps you make the most of natural light. Now redesigned from the ground up - Lumy feels more personal, purposeful, and in sync with how we live. Inspired by sunlight filtering through a window, every view carries a subtle visual echo of light traveling through a pane of glass window. Introducing Modes: Switch between profiles like Daily, Photography or Meditation to shape Lumy around your routine. See only what matters to you. Lumy also supports iOS‚Äôs State of Mind feature, offering sun exposure suggestions based on mood entries from the Health app - a gentle nudge to step outdoors and connect with nature. With seven-day weather forecasts, you can plan ahead with confidence. All sun and moon data is calculated entirely on-device, no tracking, no server requests. Only weather uses the internet. Lumy works seamlessly across iPhone, iPad, Apple Watch, Apple TV, and HomePod. One purchase unlocks full access for your family. Features: - Modes: Switch profiles to suit your needs ‚Äî from weekday planning to weekend golden hour. - Sun + Moon Tracking: Accurate data, solar compass, and future predictions. - Season Info: Displays both astronomical and meteorological seasons. - Reminders: Customisable, repeatable notifications. - Apple Watch: Complications, double-tap support, and Live Activities. - Widgets + Control Centre: Quick access via Smart Stack and more. - Interaction Upgrades: Time travel slider, Quick Access Button, fluid animations. - Visual Feel: Simulated sunlight, shimmering glows, and improved Classic mode. - Accessibility: VoiceOver, Dynamic Type, Reduce Motion, and more. - Privacy First: Works fully offline (except weather). Your data stays private. - Localised: Available in French, German, Japanese, and Chinese. Lumy supports photographers, outdoor enthusiasts, and wellness seekers to stay in rhythm with the sun and moon. *What‚Äôs Golden Hour? Golden Hour (or Magic Hour) is the short time after sunrise or before sunset when the light is soft, warm, and perfect for taking beautiful photos or videos. Sun Information Available: Sunrise, Sunset, First Light, Last Light, Golden Hour, Blue Hour, Astronomical Twilight, Nautical Twilight, Civil Twilight, Solar Noon, Solar Midnight. Moon Information Available: Moonrise, Moonset, Altitude, Azimuth, Transit, Transit Elevation, Weekly Moon Phase, Next Full Moon, New Moon, First Quarter, Last Quarter. Have feedback or suggestions? We'd love to hear from you: hello@waplestuff.com

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Folium
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫229,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫129,99 [‚Ç∫129,99 ~ ‚Ç∫229,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫129,99

Application Description

Folium is a beautifully designed, high performing multi-system emulator that allows you to play video games from retro consoles and handhelds -- NOTE -- Folium does not provide any games or system files, these must be provided by the user Emulation may be slow on older devices depending on the console or handheld emulated -- NOTE -- Supported Consoles - Game Boy, Game Boy Color - Game Boy Advance - Nintendo 3DS - Nintendo DS, Nintendo DSi - Nintendo Entertainment System - Super Nintendo Entertainment System - PlayStation 1 Supported Controllers - Backbone One - Nintendo Switch Joy-Con - Nintendo Switch Pro Controller - PlayStation DualShock 4 - PlayStation 5 DualSense - Xbox Series S - Xbox Series X Folium is in no way affiliated with Nintendo. "Nintendo" and all associated game console and handheld names and game controller names are registered trademarks of Nintendo Co., Ltd Folium is in no way affiliated with Sony. "PlayStation" and all associated game controller names are registered trademarks of Sony Group Corporation

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad
